author: vlimant
body:
#### PR description:

since the MUPOG custom nano will always include the standard nano, the definition in the mapping should strictly include the PHYS part, so that they never get separated. (oversight on my account in  #43642 )

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py --what nano -l       2500.314 --ibeos` to success

I also verified that combining `--step NANO:@EGM+@MUPOG` leads to the inclusion of "only one PHYS"
title: Custom MUON POG NANO includes default NANO
